rooms.description: Centrally located near the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
Adjacent to the living room, offering a view of the courtyard.
Efficient layout with modern fixtures and storage space, north-facing window recommended for Vastu compliance.
Located near the living area, ensuring easy access for guests.
Spacious room with ensuite bathroom and private balcony overlooking the central courtyard.
Sufficient space for family needs, located on the quieter side of the floor plan.
Integrated within master bedroom area for privacy and convenience.
Dedicated space for storage of personal belongings integrated into master bedroom area.

openings.description: The main entry is oriented towards the north, promoting positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Large windows to maximize natural light, designed with proper shading for comfort and privacy.
Internal doors facilitating easy movement while maintaining privacy between the different zones.

additional_features.description: Open central courtyard integrated into the layout to encourage natural ventilation and communal outdoor space.
Detached but adjacent to the main building for ease of access, complying with local building norms.

openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace, offering panoramic views and additional outdoor space.

additional_features.description: Open area with seating arrangements, greenery integration, and relaxation zones, designed for family leisure and gatherings.

rooms.description: Luxurious living space with expansive view of the central courtyard and surrounding landscape.
Spacious master bedroom area with enhanced privacy and luxury finishes.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows designed to maximize light and provide panoramic views.
